page.title: 18About ourselves (1)
page.content: Barry likes to play Pool and Football.Polly has a lot of hobbies including Swimming, Guides and music and belongs to a lot of clubs. Marcus likes reading and swimming and hates fighting. Annik lives on the National Stud; her Dad swims horses at the Equine pool. Melanie is good at Art but suffers from asthma. Jeremy likes BMXing and making things with Lego. Sharlotte's Dad works on a stud; she likes Culture Club. Nicola likes animals, swimming and playing the clarinet. Charlotte has won a lot of medals for Gymnastics and plays the piano. Clare also has medals for Gymnastics; she also plays the piano and likes Ballet. Emma likes swimming and sports. Andrew likes going on long walks and bike rides. Darren likes collecting stamps and drawing. Mark is mad about BMXing. Clare likes Wham.
